description:
Audio Router is a similar app that does exactly what CheVolume does, except this is free. 

Here's a simple gif to show how it's used.

![Audio Router](http://i.imgur.com/uq6ApMe.gif "Audio Router")

For all feature requests/bugs/feedback, you can send me a PM. I highly appreciate all of them. The thread is now archived, so unfortunately you can't reply to it anymore.
summary: Routes audio from programs to different audio devices.
author: https://github.com/audiorouterdev
